price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߛߏ߬ߓߌ߬ ߘߊ߫ ߒ߬ ߠߊ߫ ߞߍ߬ߟߍ ( ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ ) ߡߊ߬ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߞߘߐߓߏߙߌ ߘߌ߫
arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّواْ بَأۡسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَرۡكُضُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: falammā aḥassū basanā idhā hum min'hā yarkuḍūna
